ygData.subject: Re: DrillBit & KitKat
ygData.msgSnippet: KitKat:: She looked at Drillbit. She had mixed emotions and wasn t sure how to tell him.  She wasn t sure if she should tell him at all. Love...I..I can t.

KitKat::
She looked at Drillbit. She had mixed emotions and wasn't sure how to 
tell him.  She wasn't sure if she should tell him at 
all. "Love...I..I can't. Not right now.  I'm sure myself at this 
point of time."  She looked into his eyes and felt her spark fall.  
She put her arms around him and hugged him. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He ran into the base. There were enough bots watching the flying 
guy.
> He cought up with KitKat.
> "Hello love. Now will you tell me whats bothering you?"
